messages.msgSnippet: ... You can join any Yahoo group by taking the name of the group, adding a hyphen and then subscribe and then adding @yahoogroups.com.  So for this group you
messages.messageBody:
> > http://groups.yahoo.com/group/MailExchange
> >
> >
>
> I ALWAYS HAVE A HECK OF A TIME joining a new group~ i have to figure
>out why my passwords ( i have a few on hand for diff. groups) DONT
>WORK!!!!!!!!! once again tonite i couldnt join..........can i do it some
>other way??? Denise

You can join any Yahoo group by taking the name of the group, adding a
hyphen and then subscribe and then adding @yahoogroups.com. So for this
group you would send a blank message to
unschooling-dotcom-subscribe@yahoogroups.com . For the group in question,
you would send a blank message to MailExchange-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
Tia


No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
leschke@...
On Vancouver Island
